00020 #ifndef _PSIFileData_HEADER_
00021 #define _PSIFileData_HEADER_
00022 
00023 /*! \file PSIFileData.h This file provides reading capaibilities for PSI files.
00024  */
00025 
00026 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00027 
00028 #include <cstring>
00029 #include <fstream>
00030 #include <string>
00031 #include <vector>
00032 //
00033 
00034 //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00035 
00036 namespace affxpsi
00037 {
00038 
00039 /*! A type to hold the probe set information file entry */
00040 typedef struct _ProbeSetInfo
00041 {
00042         /*! The name of the probe set */
00043         std::string probeSetName;
00044 
00045         /*! The number of probe pairs in the set */
00046         int numberPairs;
00047 
00048 } ProbeSetInfo;
00049 
00050 /*! An STL vector of ProbeSetInfo objects */
00051 typedef std::vector<ProbeSetInfo> ProbeSetInfoVector;
00052 
00053 /*! Stores the contents of a PSI file.
00054  *
00055  * The PSI file the probe set names and the number of probe pairs in each set.
00056  */
00057 class CPSIFileData
00058 {
00059 public:
00060         /*! Constructor */
00061         CPSIFileData();
00062 
00063         /*! Destructor */
00064         ~CPSIFileData();
00065 
00066 protected:
00067         /*! The name of the PSI file */
00068         std::string m_strFileName;
00069 
00070         /*! The probe set information */
00071         ProbeSetInfoVector m_ProbeSets;
00072 
00073 public:
00074         /*! Sets the file name.
00075          * @param name The name of the PSI file.
00076          */
00077         void SetFileName(const char *name) { m_strFileName = name; }
00078 
00079         /*! Gets the file name.
00080          * @return The file name.
00081          */
00082         const char *GetFileName() const { return m_strFileName.c_str(); }
00083 
00084         /*! Gets the number of probe sets.
00085          * @return The number of probe sets.
00086          */
00087         int GetProbeSetCount() const { return (int) m_ProbeSets.size(); }
00088 
00089         /*! Gets the probe set name.
00090          * @param index The index to the probe set vector.
00091          * @return The probe set name.
00092          */
00093         std::string GetProbeSetName(int index) const { return m_ProbeSets[index].probeSetName; }
00094 
00095         /*! Gets the number of probe pairs.
00096          * @param index The index to the probe set vector.
00097          * @return The number of probe pairs.
00098          */
00099         int GetProbePairs(int index) const { return m_ProbeSets[index].numberPairs; }
00100 
00101         /*! Reads the contents of the file.
00102          * @return True if successful
00103          */
00104         bool Read();
00105 
00106         /*! Checks for the existance of a file.
00107          * @return True if the file exists
00108          */
00109         bool Exists();
00110 
00111         /*! Clears memory associated with the class */
00112         void Clear();
00113 };
